TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
because you are my soup.

waiter why is my pea soup evolving into these pea soup monsters from spore?

I believe the computer system messed up and thinks everyone is a Zosekia Skunkworks employee. Sorry.

Waiter, why is there a Drek in my soup?

BECAUSE IM A GARBAGE CAN

Waiter, there's a underscore in my soup!

Also, why am I a garbage bin...

Oh, __+_F_____vugfn fgh nkvj

Waiter, there is a waffle in my soup?

Ah! I meant to put a pancake in. Terribly sorry.

Waiter, there is a history lecture in my soup!

Goddamnit history is nearly as bad as geography.

Waiter, there's a WWI era fighter pilot that goes by the name of Baron Von Archenholer in my soup!

I'm terribly sorry, Mr Baron Von Archenholer must have gotten shot down and we did not know he was there

Waiter, there is a doge in my soup

What is that?

Waiter, there is some soup in my soup... or is it blood?

Nope. Defiantly not blood.*backs away away slowly hiding the mask*

Waiter, there is a hypetrain in my soup!

Wow. When is .90 coming out?

Waiter, there's some of my hair in my soup.

Er... Why'd you dunk your head in?

Waiter, there's a waiter in my waiter?

Edited December 7, 2014 by Tangle

Waiter waiter waiter. Waiter.

Waiter, there is an Eevee in my soup! It's looking for a water stone!

take my blue eyes white dragon and get rid of it!

Waiter, Percy Jackson is levitating my soup!

Well tell him to bugger off then.

Um waiter! I'm in my soup..again!

Get out of the soup, Mr MightyDarkStar.

Waiter, my soup just spontaneusly combusted.

That's not soup, it's molten white phosphorus!

Waiter, your mom is in my soup.

Don't u talk about my momma like that.

Waiter, there's a miniature cartoon horse in my soup. >:-[

Sorry, Danny2462 must have thought real life was a new update to KSP...

Waiter, there's no soup in my soup!

That's because you've just eaten all the soup.

Waiter, there's an EFT-1 in my soup!

You ordered the jalapeÃƒÂ±o soup

Waiter, there is someone waiting in my soup!

Tell him to either dive in or get out; just standing there isn't allowed.

There's a tank in my soup!

Tell it to bugger off.

Waiter, there's a bomb in my soup!

Oh... Danny again... "*Call off the assassination. He knows*"

Waiter, there's a waffle in my soup... But it's not getting wet!

Oops, you ordered the hydrophobic flapjacks, not the waterproof waffles.

Water, there's an 'i' in my soup!

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001
